description: This file sets up knowledge bases and an agent for interacting with web and PDF content, including creating and combining knowledge bases, initializing an agent, and making a query.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base for PDF URLs, storing PDF documents and their vectors.

classes.name: WebsiteKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Knowledge base for website URLs, storing website content and their vectors.

classes.name: CombinedKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A combined knowledge base aggregating multiple sources.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with knowledge bases and performs queries.

classes.name: WebsiteTools
classes.description: Tools for interacting with websites within the agent framework.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface for PostgreSQL.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, with options for markdown and streaming.
